New Records: Shubman Gill scored 58* off 35 balls, helping India win the match with 10 wickets remaining
Key Match Events: Jaiswal and Gill put on 156 runs for the first wicket, finishing the job themselves
Tushar Deshpande claimed Sikandar Raza for his first international wicket
Raza needed to rescue Zimbabwe as they had suddenly lost 4 for 33 after the solid opening
Post-Match Reflections: India won the series 3-1 with this match, and will play one more game on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's young IPL stars, Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill, made light work of the target, sauntering home in just 15.2 overs
Where Zimbabwe hit all of 10 fours in their 20 overs, Jaiswal and Gill smashed as many in their first four overs en route a ten-wicket thumping
Others: Wessly Madhevere and Tadiwanashe Marumani rode their luck to add 63 in 8.4 overs to give Zimbabwe a platform
Abhishek could have had a second wicket in T20Is, but for Ruturaj Gaikwad shelving a dolly at extra cover to reprieve Brian Bennett
